mapper.select: SELECT d.id AS doc_id, u.name AS doc_name, tns.name AS title_name, d.specialty, dsr.id AS sch_id, to_char(st.start_time, 'HH24:MI') AS start_time, to_char(st.end_time, 'HH24:MI') AS end_time, st.time_period_name, dsr.left_source_count, tns.ori_cost FROM doctor d JOIN "user" u ON d.id = u.id LEFT JOIN title_number_source tns ON d.doc_title_id = tns.id INNER JOIN doc_schedule_record dsr ON d.id = dsr.doc_id INNER JOIN schedule_template st ON dsr.template_id = st.id WHERE d.depart_id = #{departmentId} AND dsr.schedule_date = #{date} ORDER BY u.name, st.start_time;

SELECT d.id, u.name, d.doc_title_id, tns.name as title, d.specialty, d.details, d.depart_id, d.clinic_id, d.status FROM doctor d JOIN "user" u on u.id = d.id LEFT JOIN title_number_source tns on tns.id = d.doc_title_id WHERE d.id = #{doctorId}
mapper.update: UPDATE doc_schedule_record SET left_source_count = left_source_count - 1 WHERE id = #{scheduleRecordId} AND left_source_count > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO register_record (patient_ID, sch_ID, register_time, status) VALUES (#{patientId}, #{scheduleRecordId}, NOW(), #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT status FROM register_record WHERE patient_ID = #{patientId} AND sch_ID = #{scheduleRecordId}
mapper.update: UPDATE register_record SET status = '已取消' WHERE patient_ID = #{patientId} AND sch_ID = #{scheduleRecordId} AND status IN ('预约中','已预约')
mapper.select: SELECT rr.patient_ID AS patientId, rr.sch_ID AS scheduleRecordId, to_char(rr.register_time,'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS registerTime, rr.status AS status FROM register_record rr WHERE rr.patient_ID = #{patientId} AND rr.sch_ID = #{scheduleRecordId}
